json_to_edit.voice_over: Sometimes, the right melody can mend what words cannot.
json_to_edit.description: Lila performs a heartfelt song in a small, intimate venue.
json_to_edit.name: Healing Melody
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Lila's emotional performance touches a heartbroken listener.

qa.action: Lila takes the stage in a dimly lit, intimate music bar.

hf.action: Lila begins to play, her fingers dancing across the guitar strings.

tr.action: Lila's eyes close as she pours her heart into the lyrics.

xc.action: A teary-eyed listener in the front row is visibly moved by the performance.

ka.action: Lila's face shows intense emotion as she reaches the song's climax.

fn.action: The audience rises in a standing ovation as Lila finishes her song.

edit_command: Remove every third shot from the scene, but don't change anything else.

label.rationale: we will remove every third shot from the scene as requested, while keeping all other elements unchanged. the scene currently has 6 shots, so we will remove the 3rd and 6th shots. this means we need to remove the shots with keys "tr" and "fn" from the "shots" dictionary and update the "list_display_order" accordingly. we'll also update the "number_of_shots" to reflect the new total. all other information in the json will remain the same.
